PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2001-08972001-05-170,  ,  ,  ,  PWGS, 
PrecisApproval of Regulations Amending the LETTER MAIL REGULATIONS, whereby the Canada Post Corporation will be required to publish a Notice in the Canada Gazette (Part I) of any increase in the basic domestic letter rate no later than the 1st day of July in the year before the increase goes into effect.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2001-0178 Publication Date: 2001-06-06
Attachments
precis:
Approval of Regulations Amending the LETTER MAIL REGULATIONS, whereby the
Canada Post Corporation will be required to publish a Notice in the Canada
Gazette (Part I) of any increase in the basic domestic letter rate no later
than the 1st day of July in the year before the increase goes into effect.
